title: Flesh and Bone: A Supernatural Adventure Series (Templar Chronicles Missions Book 4)
features: We all have those moments that define us, those moments that make us who we are, and for Matthew Cornelius Riley one such moment came on a dark night in August nearly twenty-five years ago.The events of that evening would drive him into the waiting arms of the Templar Order, would help him rise through the ranks to become not just a member of the Echo Team but the executive officer to its infamous commander, Cade Williams.This is the story of that fateful night.(The events of Flesh and Bone take place shortly after those in book three, A Tear in the Sky)
description: Book 1: The HereticBook 2: A Scream of AngelsBook 3: A Tear in the SkyBook 4: Infernal GamesBook 5: Judgment DayBook 6: Fall of NightBook 7: Darkness Reigns
Book 1: Shades of BloodBook 2 The Hungry DarkBook 3: Tooth and ClawBook 4: Flesh and Bone

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/igroal45jeqp5mbhp1ksbshsqe._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Joseph Nassise', 'about': ['Joseph Nassise is the New York Times, USA Today, and Der Spiegel bestselling author of more than fifty novels in the supernatural action adventure and urban fantasy genres, including the Templar Chronicles series, the Jeremiah Hunt series, and the Great Undead War series.', "He's a former two-term president of the Horror Writers Association, the world's largest organization of professional horror writers, and a three-time Bram Stoker Award and International Horror Guild Award nominee. His work has been translated into six languages and he's sold more than three-quarters of a million copies of his books worldwide to date.", 'You can learn more about him on the web at www.josephnassise.com.']}
